items.sentence: It's close to eleven. It's about time we went to bed.
It's close to seven o'clock. We have to go to school.
We're going out for lunch. Would you like to join us?
This nation's economy is growing by leaps and bounds.
I bet it isn't the first time that Tom has done that.
Tom is a lot smarter than people give him credit for.
Tom is going to kill me when he finds out what I did.
Tom is thinking of moving so he'll be closer to Mary.
I don't know Tom, so I can't tell you what he's like.
Tom is prohibited from holding a leadership position.
